original_text: If the bright spot be white in the skin of his flesh, and in sight be not deeper than the skin, and the hair thereof be not turned white; then the priest shall shut up him that hath the plague seven days:
korean_text: 피부에 색점이 희나 우묵하지 아니하고 그 털이 희지 아니하면 제사장은 그 환자를 이레 동안 가두어둘 것이며

sentences.original_text: If the bright spot be white in the skin of his flesh
and in sight be not deeper than the skin
and the hair thereof be not turned white
then the priest shall shut up him that hath the plague seven days
sentences.korean_translation: 제사장이 그 질병을 가진 사람을 7일간 격리할 것입니다
